about.title: About
about.welcome: Welcome to Coffee: From Legend to Latte – a blog dedicated to exploring the rich tapestry of coffee culture. From the ancient legends of the goat herder Kaldi in the Ethiopian highlands to the sophisticated espresso bars of modern cities, we celebrate every chapter of coffee's remarkable journey.

about.mission: We believe every cup of coffee tells a story. Our mission is to share these stories – from the farmers who carefully tend their crops to the baristas who craft the perfect brew, from ancient rituals to modern techniques.
about.community: Coffee is best when shared. We invite you to join our growing community of coffee enthusiasts as we explore this incredible world together, one article at a time.
